Nightlight:

"I'm not in position to lie... I'm telling the true and I always have 
told it...What will we get if we lie? Nothing... Lamda was right when 
she said that we aren't gods to forgive easyly, Windlord doubted and 
I doubted too... I don't know what think Windlord, but I was starting 
to forget when you tried to destroy us..." said Nightlight who had 
now a double reason to be worried "I... I hoped that you and Lambda 
wanted join us after she... her wounds cured and after you recover 
the memorie... She come and said something like "I fired... " I can't 
remeber what else, I just liked help... I'd thought that if you 
didn't join us, we let you go and things continues like... like 
before that happen... If we had liked destroy you, we would nerver be 
here... "
